author: Robert Iafolla
title: U.S. Supreme Court says CNH Industrial retirees don't have lifetime health benefits
text:
The U.S. Supreme Court on Tuesday threw out a class action filed by retirees of CNH Industrial seeking lifetime healthcare benefits, saying the lower court had misconstrued a collective bargaining agreement between the retirees and the United Kingdom-based industrial equipment manufacturer.
In a per curiam ruling, the Court held that the agreement clearly called for the retireesâ€™ benefits to end in 2004 and said the 6th U.S. Circuit Court of Appeals had erred when it presumed the agreement created a lifetime promise of health care.
